comments.author: btcnope
comments.body: Why Do You Need to Provide a BSC Chain Wallet Address for the PEPOW Airdrop?Many of you have been asking why we require your BSC chain wallet address for the airdrop. We want to clarify and provide a clear explanation. The reason is simple: the PEPOW token address is the same as your BSC (Binance Smart Chain) address. This is true for all tokens in the EVM (Ethereum Virtual Machine) chains. It doesn't matter if the token is deployed or not; your PEPOW wallet will always carry the same BSC address.By providing your BSC wallet address, we ensure a seamless and secure distribution of PEPOW tokens directly to your wallet. This eliminates any confusion or complications that may arise from using a separate or unfamiliar address.Rest assured that your privacy and security are of utmost importance to us. We value your trust and are committed to creating a transparent and user-friendly experience.If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our team. Thank you for your participation in the PEPOW Airdrop!Join our Telegram group for more updates and discussions: https://t.me/PEPOWOfficial
